We are happy to announce the winners of JPAM’s annual “Excellence in Refereeing Awards”: @ericwchan @babson, @ Amy Farrell @NU_SCCJ, @jenniheissel @NPS_Monterey. Each winner will be awarded with a $500 cash prize and receive a letter of commendation from the journal.
